name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Driven Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of experience in developing and integrating high-performance solutions through robust APIs using **REST**, **SOAP**, and **OAuth** protocols. Proficient in handling data interchange formats like **JSON** and **XML**, and skilled in utilizing tools like **Postman**, **Swagger**, and **OpenAPI** to enhance API testing and documentation. My strong technical foundation in **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **Node.js** ensures the delivery of scalable and efficient applications across cloud environments, including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**.

I have successfully led teams in creating enterprise-grade platforms within healthcare and finance, leveraging **FastAPI** and **Django** for backend development while employing **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue** for dynamic frontend solutions. My hands-on experience with microservices architecture and event-driven systems complements my expertise in CI/CD automation. Additionally, I excel in developing AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, contributing to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS.

I bring a proven track record of building secure applications while developing machine learning pipelines and implementing effective MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
